did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files and publications from the University Centers for Rational Alternatives and the Cornell Committee on Special Education Projects (COPES). Also minutes and related material from several Cornell University faculty meetings.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Professor Blumen's files focus on campus unrest in the late Sixties and treatment and education of minority students at Cornell University. The collections include correspondence, minutes, files, and publications from the University Centers for Rational Alternatives and from Cornell's Committee on Special Education Projects (COSEP). There is an audio cassette tape of Professor Blumen explaining these files. In addiition to those files there are minutes and related material for the Cornell Faculty Council of Representatives meetings, University Faculty meetings, and ILR Faculty meetings. Two drafts of an appearently unpublished book, "Cornell: 1969" is also included.
